#!/usr/bin/env ruby -KU
char_to_entity = { } File.open("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/entities.txt").read.gsub(/^(\d+)\t(.+)$/) do |_| char_to_entity[[$1.to_i].pack('U')] = $2 end
res = STDIN.read.gsub(/[^\x00-\x7F]|["']|&(?!([a-zA-Z0-9]+|#[0-9]+|#x[0-9a-fA-F]+);)/) do |ch| ent = char_to_entity[ch] ent ? "&#{ent};" : sprintf("&#x%02X;", ch.unpack("U")[0]) end
print res
Convert Character / Selection to Entities Excl. Tags
